subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Mario Pino will attempt to add to his impressive numbers at Pimlico Race Course and win his first Preakness Stakes when he climbs aboard Hard Spun on Saturday.
snippet: Mario Pino will attempt to add to his impressive numbers at Pimlico Race Course and win his first Preakness Stakes when he climbs aboard Hard Spun on Saturday.
